Comment: Removes all trailing spaces - unarranges columns
Sort lines n to m by column c - ! for reverse sorting - unarrange before sorting
Delete from cursor till end of line
Set the current shown directory in Fileexplorer as working directory
Formats the highlighted section e.g. ggvG= to format the whole file
Shows the current status of the working tree
Shows the help to a shortcut with CTRL
Disables highlighting e.g. after a search
Sets focus to window dependening on the arrow key
increase current window height N lines
decrease current window height N lines
